entry.title: Awesome Fonts Updates on Apr 25, 2017
entry.content:
Emojis / Fonts

  • alfred-emoji-workflow (‚≠ê636) - Alfred 2 workflow for searching emoji codes
  • emoji-cheat-sheet.com (‚≠ê6.4k) - A one pager for emojis on Campfire and GitHub
  • emoji-data-js (‚≠ê64) - Emoji encoding swiss army knife for NodeJS
  • emoji-minesweeper (‚≠ê885) - Minesweeper game made with emojis
  • emoji-regex (‚≠ê1.8k) - A regular expression to match all Emoji-only symbols as per the Unicode Standard
  • emoji-rspec (‚≠ê173) - Custom Emoji Formatters for RSpec
  • emoji-translate (‚≠ê1.6k) - Translate text to emoji
  • emoji (‚≠ê304) - All of the emoji supported on GitHub pull requests, issues, comments, commit messages, markdown files, etc
  • emoji (‚≠ê2.3k) - Find the emoji that echoes your mind
  • emoji (‚≠ê445) - A gem. For Emoji. For everyone.
  • emojidex (‚≠ê8) - Emoji-as-a-service provider and set of tools and assets
  • emojify (‚≠ê1.6k) - Emoji on the command line
  • emojilib (‚≠ê1.7k) - Emoji keyword library
  • emojillate (‚≠ê348) - Pixellate an image into emoji
  • emojistatic (‚≠ê97) - CDN static asset generation for emoji
  • emojitracker (‚≠ê741) - Track ALL the emoji
  • gemoji (‚≠ê4.5k) - Emoji images and names
  • gh-emoji (‚≠ê159) - Github emoji parsing done right
  • megamoji (‚≠ê169) - Making megamojis like a pro
  • mojibar (‚≠ê2k) - Emoji searcher but as a menubar app
  • mojime (‚≠ê56) - Outputs random emojis
  • php-emoji (‚≠ê1.3k) - A PHP Emoji conversion library
  • twemoji (‚≠ê17k) - Twitter Emoji for Everyone
  • vim-emoji (‚≠ê614) - Emoji in Vim

entry.title: Awesome Fonts Updates on Mar 07, 2017
entry.content:
General

  • Fonts In Use - A public archive of typography

Free fonts / Collections

  • Font Squirrel - A curated collection of free fonts from a variety of foundries
  • Gidole - Open source, modern DIN
  • Google Fonts
    • Downloader for Google Fonts (‚≠ê1.5k)
    • Files of Google Fonts (‚≠ê19k) (sources)
    • Noto Fonts (‚≠ê2.5k) - Internationalized font for all languages, with rich support for CJK and emoji
    • Roboto (‚≠ê3.8k) - Default font on Android & ChromeOS, and the recommended typeface for Material Design
  • The League of Moveable Type - The Open-Source Type Movement
    • Chunk
    • Junction
    • League Gothic
    • ... And more

Free fonts / Fonts

  • Redacted (‚≠ê5.4k) - Keep your wireframes free of distracting Lorem Ipsum
  • WorkSans (‚≠ê1.7k)

Iconic fonts / Fonts

  • Appa Sariicon (‚≠ê29) - 147 8-bit retro style webfont icons form web and mobile
  • Country Icons (‚≠ê11k) - A collection of all country flags in SVG and CSS
  • Evil Icons Simple and clean SVG icon pack with the code to support Rails, Sprockets, Node.js, Gulp, Grunt and CDN
  • Font Custom (‚≠ê3.3k) - Icon font generator
  • font-mfizz (‚≠ê538) - Vector Icons for Technology and Software Geeks
  • FontAwesomeKit (‚≠ê2.8k) - Icon font library for iOS. Currently supports Font-Awesome, Foundation icons, Zocial, and ionicons.
  • fontello - Iconic fonts scissors
    • brandico.font - Font with logos of social services & messagers
    • fontelico.font - Open Source iconic font from Fontello project
    • typicons.font - Transformed Typicons
  • IcoMoon-Free - A package of flat vector icons together with an installable ligature font
  • Iconic (‚≠ê2.4k) - Icon set in raster, vector and font formats
  • icono - One tag One icon, no font or svg, Pure CSS
  • ionicons - The premium icon font for Ionic
  • Map Icons (‚≠ê1k) - Font for use with Google Maps API and Google Places API using SVG markers and icon labels
  • Material design icons (‚≠ê52k) - Official icon set from Google
  • mfglabs-iconset - Awesome web font icon by MFG Labs
  • Micon (‚≠ê201) - Iconic Windows 10 font and CSS toolkit
  • octicons - GitHub's icon font
  • PE-Analog-Clock-icon-font (‚≠ê301) - A set of icons for displaying a visual ("analog") representation of time stamps
  • stackicons (‚≠ê954) - Icon font and Sass-based construction kit for Stackicons-Social, which supports multiple button shapes and a unique "multi-color" option in CSS for over 60 social brands
  • svg-icon - An ultimate SVG icons collection done right
  • weather-icons - 189 weather themed icons inspired by Font Awesome and ready for Bootstrap
  • Zocial (‚≠ê189) - Sass and Compass CSS3 social buttons framework
    • CSS social buttons (‚≠ê1.7k) - Entirely vector-based social buttons

Programming fonts / Fonts

  • Adobe Fonts
    • Source Code Pro
    • Source Han Serif (‚≠ê8.7k)
    • Source Sans Pro (‚≠ê3.6k)
    • Source Serif Pro (‚≠ê2.2k)
  • Codeface (‚≠ê6.3k) - Gallery of monospaced fonts for developers
  • Go Fonts - Open source fonts from Golang Project
  • Input - Flexible system of fonts designed specifically for code
  • Meslo-Font (‚≠ê2.7k) - Customized version of Apple's Menlo font
  • Nerd Fonts (‚≠ê59k) - Collection of over 20 patched fonts for Powerline, Font Awesome, Octicons, Devicons, and Vim Devicons

Programming fonts / Programming fonts with ligatures

  • FiraCode (‚≠ê79k) - Monospaced font with programming ligatures
  • Fixedsys Excelsior (‚≠ê1.1k)
  • Iosevka (‚≠ê20k) - Spatially efficient monospace font family for programming. Built from code.
  • PragmataPro - Proprietary font with special ligatures for Haskell, Agda, APL, etc

JavaScript libs / Programming fonts with ligatures

  • fontmin (‚≠ê6k) - Font minifier
  • localFont (‚≠ê847) - Save fonts in localStorage
  • opentype.js (‚≠ê4.7k) - Parser and writer for TrueType and OpenType fonts
  • Typr.js (‚≠ê957) - Parser and utility for working with fonts (TTF, OTF)

Other / Event listeners for fonts loading on a web page

  • Font Squirrel Webfont Generator - Upload OTF or TTF fonts, receive webfonts
  • FontForge (‚≠ê7.1k) - Cross-platform font editor
  • Powerline Fonts (‚≠ê26k) - Patched fonts for Powerline users
